topic.title: Elite, Education, graduation, career, harvard, cambridge, success
topic.body:
- Are you the well educated elite guy who has spend decades in schools and universities ?
- Your family members are mostly "successful" peoples like doctors, lawyers, judges.. ?
- Poor or "less educated" people are worthless fucks to you ?

- But now you're old and slowly realizing that all the success haven't bought you anything ?

Good for you ! Congratuliations ! You've successfully wasted your precious lifetime with worthless shit !

1566891933_16wy1B4fK7XdsaZPBsQkxcnUzrcMy.body:
> [numismatist](#comment_72_1F8BHc6FztvWRy9cttVXLj22DSSvMdbGy): I own my home outright, I pay about $2k a year in property taxes.

that must hurt real bad....poor boy :' (
